title: Camper Catastrophe: Book One Trailer Park Travails
description: Unexpectedly relocated to a 55+ park in Florida, a petty feud starts. When her next door nuisance is killed, she discovers she likes him better dead. She didn't do it, but has to prove who did! Will she expose the killer or will her meddlesome tendencies prematurely end her golden years of retirement?
author: Mary Lu Scholl Book One Trailer Park Travails
